title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and users can move them around. However, the scrollbars do not have any effect. Even when opening a small image, like an icon, the scrollbars are present but do not do anything.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect, even when opening a small image like an icon.
